title: Financer
description: App to manage income and expenses. Built with React.js, TailwindCSS and saved in LocalStorage.

title: Notebook
description: Record your notes and upcoming events. Built with React.js, TailwindCSS and saved in LocalStorage.

title: GymNotes
description: Easily track your gym progress. Built with React.js, TailwindCSS and saved in LocalStorage.

title: Dragon ball API
description: Explore the universe created by Akira Toriyama. Built with React.js, Vite, TailwindCSS and DragonBallApi.

title: Dragon ball store
description: Store based on the most famous anime in the world. Created with React Native, Nativewind, Redux, SQLite.
